Which creature walks on four legs in the morning,
two legs in the afternoon, and three legs in the evening?
The guardian of the pyramids, the Sphinx, asked travelers this riddle.
Legend says that those who could not answer were eaten by the Sphinx.
Jotaro and the others have finally reached Cairo.
we should work our way from the outskirts inward to the center.
Jotaro and the others have arrived in Cairo.
But before the pyramid named Dio,
a few more Sphinxes stood in their way.
There is something I would like to ask you.
We are looking for the building in this picture.
Do you know where it is?
Joseph and the others were exhausted.
they had searched constantly for the building in the picture.
Joseph managed to take of Dio's mansion.
Dio had moved to a new hideout,
and the Speedwagon Foundation had lost track of his whereabouts.
If they are unable to find him in the next few days,
Holly's life will come to an end.
Nope, I do not recognize it.
Cairo has a population of six million.
There must be two to three million buildings.
Will we be able to find him?
Someone has to know where it is.
I cannot tell from just a picture...
Sorry, it does not look familiar.
W-Was it you who just said that?
The characters, groups, places, laws, and names used in this program have no connection to any existing in real life.
I just heard someone say they know this building.
I did indeed say that I know where the mansion in that picture is located.
We are pretty lucky to have found someone who knows
where it is just from this picture.
Are you asking me to give you the answer for free?
I will pay you ten pounds.
I am a sucker for cheap thrills.
I cannot get enough of them.
Well, you could say that I make my living gambling.
I am not sure what you are getting at.
If you do not like gambling, just say so.
I am asking you exactly what you mean by that.
Would you make a silly little wager with me?
If you win, I will tell you where that place is for free.
I am pretty confident when it comes to wagers,
but we do not have time to play poker right now.
I will give you another twenty pounds, so please just tell us.
The thing about gambling is, you can do it with anything.
It will not take any time at all.
Now, why do not we bet on which smoked fish that cat will eat first?
You are really starting to annoy me!
Just take the thirty pounds, and hurry up and tell us!
Polnareff, that is not the way to ask someone for information.
Then I will make a bet.
I pick the one on the right!
Then I shall wager on the left.
He might be an enemy Stand user.
But he might just be a compulsive gambler.
If he does anything even remotely strange, plow through him with Star Platinum.
By the way, if I lose, what am I supposed to pay you?
What kind of joke is that?
I want to hurry up and get the hell away from him.
The cat has taken notice of the smoked fish.
The kitty's going to the right.
If I were a cat, I would pick the bigger one.
The one on the right looks bigger!
It first took the left, then the right, and then ran.
What are you going to do now?
I am getting sick of asking around about that building.
As per our agreement, let us have you pay up.
That is indeed what you just wagered.
I am a Stand user that steals souls!
Gambling makes it easier for the human soul to leave its vessel.
It is my Stand's power to steal it at that moment!
If I die, Polnareff's soul, which is in my Stand's grasp, will also die.
This means I have already gotten rid of one
of the people trying to get in Lord Dio's way.
Evem if he was just a fool.
It is a little overdue, but allow me to introduce myself.
There is an apostrophe after the D.
The Stand that steals souls from those who lost a bet...
By the way, this is my cat.
the one who failed to see through it is the loser.
I believe gambling is just like relationships.
It is all about fooling the other.
Are you going to kill me with your bare hands?
If you want this soul to die, as well.
You will not walk away from this in one piece.
Do you remember what you were doing on the night of
I was gambling with an American man named Stephen Moor,
and he said the same thing you just did.
The one below is Moor's father, and his wife is right next to him.
If you want to get Polnareff's soul back, you have no choice but to continue
He is planning to take us, one by one.
If you are scared, you can go home...
Well, have a drink and think about it long and hard.
M-Mr. Joestar, what are you trying to do?
Have you heard of surface tension, Barbie?
It is the force that is keeping that drink from breaking the surface, correct?
What do you plan to do?
We will take turns putting coins in this glass.
The one who makes it overflow loses.
I will wager my soul on it!
I will wager my soul on it!
I will not let him cheat!
I am the one who chose the method of this wager!
Jotaro, make sure he does not cheat.
Do you mind if I inspect the glass and coins?
Of course, you have that right.
You also have the right to make sure I am not cheating.
First, will you guarantee that if you lose,
you will return Polnareff's soul, no matter what?
If I lose, I always pay up.
I am an expert at this trick with a glass and coins.
I am not easy to beat when surface tension is involved.
It should fit about eight or nine more coins...
As long as I can remain calm and my fingers do not shake.
May I put in more than one coin at a time?
If you can do it all at once.
Hey, I think I saw a little wave there.
Your guts are quite impressive, to put in five at once.
He has cotton between his finger and the coin.
He is squeezing it out and adding to the alcohol.
And you wanted me to watch for cheating?
Even one more and the drink will spill over!
It is not a scam if you are not caught!
That is what he said himself.
This is bad for my heart.
I thought it was going to spill...
Now it is your turn, Obie.
It is not Obie or Barbie!
He is screwing up his name on purpose to make him agitated.
He is a gambler at heart.
It is your turn to put in a coin, D'Arby.
There is a shadow, so this angle is difficult.
I will put it in from the right side of the table.
You may put it in from wherever you like.
Though because of my cheat, it is already at its limit.
He cannot put any more in, no matter what he tries.
It will overflow if he even touches the surface.
You are thinking that this glass's surface tension is at it is limit.
There is no way it would not overflow!
What do you mean, there is no way it would not overflow?
As you can see, it went in.
He made no suspicious moves that could have been cheating.
I was watching with Star Platinum.
He put the coin in fairly.
There is no doubt about it.
I made sure that it would overflow if one more was added!
There is no way one more could have gone in!
Or are you trying to wait until it evaporates?
Joestar acknowledged in his mind that he would already lost the bet!
That is why his soul emerged.
I, D'Arby, have won this bet!
Holly, I might not be able to save you, after all.
As long as you two do not abandon
these two and run away with your tails between your legs, that is.
You do not learn, do you?
If you kill me, these two souls will die, as well.
If you are going to make trouble, I will have to ask you to leave!
You realized it too late, Jotaro.
Is there something wrong with the glass?
This is how one more coin went in.
There was a tiny bit of chocolate on the bottom of the glass's outside.
he asked to inspect the glass and coins, and that is when he stuck it on.
I believe you were aware that
if it is not discovered in time, you cannot call it cheating.
How is a bit of chocolate the reason the coin fit?
but until a moment ago, it was solid at the bottom of the glass.
He used just enough so we would not notice,
but the glass was propped up so it would tilt.
Once it melted, the surface became level.
Even though the surface tension was at its limit,
he made it so at least one more coin would fit.
Could chocolate actually melt with such convenient timing?
He melted it using the sun's heat.
He went to the right side of the table
so the sun's rays would directly hit the glass and melt the chocolate.
D'Arby, get your trump card ready.
We will finish this with poker.
Poker is one of the games I am best at!
This man just beat Mr. Joestar!
but he is still more dangerous than any other Stand user we have met so far.
I cannot afford not to do this.
He is not doing anything suspicious, and yet...
Cheating is all about finding a mental blind spot.
